name: Warrior
description: Masters of melee combat and defense. Warriors excel at protecting their allies and holding the front line.

name: Cleric
description: Divine servants who channel the power of the gods to heal wounds and smite the undead.

name: Paladin
description: Holy warriors who combine martial prowess with divine magic. They protect the innocent and smite evil.

name: Shadow Knight
description: Dark warriors who serve death itself. They combine melee combat with dark magic and necromancy.

name: Ranger
description: Skilled hunters and trackers who are at home in the wilds. They excel at ranged combat and nature magic.

name: Rogue
description: Swift and cunning assassins who strike from the shadows. Masters of stealth and precision.

name: Monk
description: Unarmed combat masters who rely on speed, agility, and discipline. They strike with devastating precision.

name: Mage
description: Wielders of destructive arcane power. Mages command the elements and summon powerful creatures.

name: Enchanter
description: Masters of illusion and mind control. Enchanters buff allies, charm enemies, and control the battlefield.

name: Necromancer
description: Dark mages who command the dead and drain life from their enemies. They excel at solo play through undead minions.

name: Wizard
description: Pure destructive magic users. Wizards deal massive damage but are fragile and require protection.

name: Druid
description: Nature priests who heal with the power of the wilds. They can also shapeshift and teleport.

name: Shaman
description: Spiritual guides who combine healing with powerful buffs and curses. They excel at supporting groups.

name: Bard
description: Jacks-of-all-trades who use songs to buff allies and debuff enemies. Bards can move extremely fast with speed songs.
